jobDescription: Duration: 12 months with possible extension or Conversion  Location: Sacramento, CA 95828 Develop reporting process from data collected thru Sales Force and other systems to provide accurate data analysis reports of vendor products, quality issues, craftsmanship ect.  Provide weekly or bi weekly reports from data collected to depts. for analysis. Must be able to create such reports to provide necessary information required for Engineer analysis.  Assists with coordinating routine reporting and data collection support activities from systems and subsystems to ensure the integrity of computer generated data.
